name: Synctrack – Sync PayPal Tracking Auto
author: Omegatheme

sections.description:
With 2-year experience working on Shopify, we never stop trying to bring the perfect App for our users. Synctrack helped over 10k merchants to win disputes and solve “PayPal holds” with over 800.000 transactions/ month.

How it works?

Once you have fulfilled orders, SyncTrack – Sync tracking auto will be noticed, and get the tracking information and send it to PayPal automatically. Adding order tracking info is one of the requirements and it protects you from disputes like Unauthorized Transaction or Item Not Received. This information enables you to access funds more quickly, provide seller protection, and keep customers informed.

Why use SyncTrack – Sync PayPal tracking auto

Adding tracking info to PayPal improves cash flow and reduce chargebacks, disputes, and refund from customers for these reasons:

  • A red flag is raised regarding your account, payment provider may apply a reserve on it
  • There’s a rocket in sales or disputes or chargebacks level, payment provider is holding your payments for up to 21 days in order to protect the buyers
  • Seller Protection reduces claims and chargebacks and helps prevent fraud

With Synctrack, by providing tracking information through PayPal:

  • Customers can keep track of their transactions
  • You can improve your account’s track record – and have the reserve level lowered (or even completely removed)
  • You can access your funds right after delivery with supported carriers

What makes us different?

  • Real-time sync PayPal tracking and Stripe: Minimize the time money is on hold
  • Synchronize shipments at 1000 trackings/min (exclusive)
  • Process old orders within up to 365 days (exclusive)
  • Manage & sync orders for all stores in 1 place with 1 subscription
  • Unlimited accounts – All plans
  • Supports all third-party checkout and merchant payment gateways
  • Onboarding and quick setup in just 1 minute
  • Auto-matching courier

Synchronize shipments at 1000 trackings/min
The speed of Synctrack for syncing is 1000 trackings/ min, that’s super fast. Therefore, you can minimize the time of being held by PayPal.

Process old orders within up to 365 days
Not only 90 days, 365 days period is the number of days you can sync past orders.

Multi-stores integration
Manage & sync orders for all stores in 1 place with 1 subscription

Benefits

Auto sync tracking info to Paypal

Once the order fulfilled, the app will be notice and auto get the tracking information and send it to paypal.

Protect your Paypal account

Adding tracking info is one of the requirements and protects you from disputes like Unauthorized Transaction or Item Not Received.

Less complaints

Customers often request refunds, file disputes or even chargebacks. By providing your customers valid tracking information through PayPal, they can keep tabs on their purchases and know when to expect delivery.

Pricing

Find out about all the pricing options

Requirements

  • WooCommerce 3.4 or newer
  • Enabled pretty permalinks (required for WooCommerce REST API)
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin

The latest versions are always available in the WordPress Repository, and you can choose one of your favorite ways to install it:

  • automatically using built-in plugin installer (recommended)
  • manually by uploading a zip archive
  • manually by FTP

2. Complete the setup

After the installation, continue by click to Synctrack - Add PayPal Tracking Auto menu item and follow the instructions in our Sign Up wizard.
sections.faq:
How to reset the plugin?

If you need to return the plugin to its original settings (for example when you used wrong Google account during login) you can delete all the plugin data via uninstalling and reinstalling it.

  1. Go to the Plugins, click on Deactivate below the Synctrack – Sync PayPal Tracking Auto plugin name. After the plugin is deactivated, you will be able to Delete it.
  2. At this time, all the plugin data stored in your database are safely removed. Now you can click on Add new button and install it again.

Support

If you would have any difficulty with the usage of this extension, or have any issues you would like to raise with us please feel free to submit a support ticket by emailing contact@omegatheme.com.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0 – 2024-01-17

  • Update High Performance Order Storage

1.0.0

  • Final release

1.0.1

  • update dispute template
